titleStmt.title: Edwin M. Stanton to James F. Robinson
CWG14458

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Handwritten Transcriptions of Civil War Telegrams

body.p: I regret that the Department cannot issue Quartermaster & Ordinance supplies to the State authorities before the men are mustered in if the rendezvous are exposed to danger the place must be changed or sufficient guards supplied by the Commander of the Department.

E M Stanton
Sec'y of War
